This App was created by [Abdullah Albyati](www.albyati.com) using R with the following packages
```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(data.table)
library(wordcloud)
library(shiny)
library(tm)
library(shinydashboard)
library(dashboardthemes)
library(ggplot2)
```
